text: Arau ami kerala susambadadata arau satarkakarairaupehe raachulasakalaka praerana karaom, kintu kaphirasakale batilara dbaraa tarka karae, yate tara madhyamata satyaka byartha karai diba parae. Lagate sihamte mora nidarsanaralika arau yiborara dbaraa sihamtaka satarka karaa haiche se'iboraka bidraupara bisayaraupe grahana karae
